metadata.title: Screen Life - How Much Time Are You Losing?
metadata.description: Calculate how much of your precious life is spent on screens and get motivated to change

hero.title: Screen Life
hero.subtitle: Discover how much of your life goes to screens

stats.note: Based on 8 hours of free time per day (accounting for sleep and work/school)

message.none: Enter your daily screen time to see the impact.
message.low: Not bad! You have healthy digital habits. Keep it up!
message.medium: That's significant. Consider setting some screen time limits.
message.high: That's a lot of screen time. Your future self will thank you for cutting back.
message.extreme: Whoa! You're spending most of your free time on screens. Time to reclaim your life?

cta.title: Ready to take back your time?
cta.description: Small changes add up. Even 30 minutes less per day gives you back 7.5 days per year.
